subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Tim Duncan’s trophy cabinet is stuffed, its shelves lined with more precious metals than the periodic table of the elements. There are two regular-season Most Valuable Player awards (2002, 2003), three N.B.A. finals M.V.P. awards (1999, 2003, 2005) and, not least, a shiny ring collection reflecting the San Antonio Spurs’ championships in 1999, 2003 and 2005.
